short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Orange Wallet: Effortless Bitcoin Layer-2 Transactions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Orange Wallet, is your seamless solution for managing Bitcoin assets on the innovative OrangeChain network. Utilizing advanced rollup and zero-knowledge proof technology, it provides a secure, efficient, and user-friendly experience.
Seamlessly send & receive Token on OrangeChain
- Self-custodial wallet for total control
- Robust privacy & security features
- Intuitive DeFi exploration
- Instant connectivity to Orange Chain dApps
- Personalize your interface with customized light and dark modes.
Unlock the future of Bitcoin transactions with Orange Wallet. Install now for a seamless experience.
